name: Da Cao
content: Da Cao@Hunan UniversitySearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationDa CaoAssociate ProfessorCollege of Computer Science and Electronic EngineeringHunan UniversityLushan Road (S), Yuelu District, Changsha, Hunan Province, China, 410082.Email: caoda0721@gmail.comBiographyI am currently an associate professor in the College of Computer Science and Electronic Engineering, Hunan University. Before this job, I achieved my master and Ph.D in the School of Information Science and Engineering, Xiamen University in 2013 and 2017, respectively. During the period from Sep. 2015 to Aug. 2016, I worked as an intern in National University of Singapore under of the supervision of Professor Tat-Seng Chua.Research InterestsMultimedia
